ing: 1 Red Delicious apple, cored and diced
des: "This Filipino version of fruit salad, modified from Auntie Josie's recipe, infuses a condensed milk cream coating with a mixture of canned and exotic fruits."
ins: Stir together the fruit cocktail, lychees, macapuno, palm seeds, creamed corn, apple, Asian pear, sour cream and condensed milk in a large bowl. Chill for at least one hour before serving.
